scripts.prebuild: npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-messages install && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-messages run build && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-connector install && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-connector run build
scripts.build-all: npm run prebuild && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-transformers install && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-transformers run build
scripts.lint: npm run build-all && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-messages run lint && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-transformers run lint && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-connector run lint && eslint . --ext .ts
scripts.prettier: npm run build-all && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-messages run prettier && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-transformers run prettier && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-connector run prettier && prettier --cache --check "**/*.{ts,js,json}"
scripts.prettify: npm run build-all && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-messages run prettify &&  npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-transformers run prettify &&  npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-connector run prettify && prettier --cache --write "**/*.{ts,js,json}"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build-all && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-messages run test:coverage && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-transformers run test:coverage && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-connector run test:coverage && jest --config jest.config.cjs --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='src/**/*.{ts,jxs}'
scripts.test-bundle: npm run build-all && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-messages run test && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-transformers run test && npm --prefix ../packages/worldpay-raft-connector run test && jest --config jest.config.cjs
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run test-bundle
